text: 10.20 Lo 32.17, Sng 106.37, Lep 9.20 Yad pen anɨb agebin. Binɨb God nop ma nepal okok, tap yepɨs anɨb okok tap pak sɨbog ñɨbal okok, kɨli kɨcheki walɨjpal tap okok nep pak sɨbog ñɨbal, God nop pak sɨbog ma ñɨbal. Anɨb ak nɨm, nɨbi kɨcheki okok ayɨp jɨmñɨl nokom anɨb anep yenɨgabɨm ak, tep ma yɨbɨl gɨnɨgab agɨl anɨb agebin.
